verses.name: Jeremiah 6:17
verses.text: Also I set watchmen over you, saying, Hearken to the sound of the trumpet. But they said, We will not hearken.

verses.name: Jeremiah 6:18
verses.text: Therefore hear, ye nations, and know, O congregation, what is among them.

verses.name: Jeremiah 6:19
verses.text: Hear, O earth: behold, I will bring evil upon this people, even the fruit of their thoughts, because they have not hearkened unto my words, nor to my law, but rejected it.

verses.name: Jeremiah 6:20
verses.text: To what purpose cometh there to me incense from Sheba, and the sweet cane from a far country? your burnt offerings are not acceptable, nor your sacrifices sweet unto me.
